plot outline: Parthan is loved by all his villagers as he works for the welfare of the people. He is constantly in disagreement with his uncle, but falls in love with his daughter, unaware that she has a hidden agenda. A new friend, Madhavan, comes to the aid of Parthan. Their adventures together form the rest of the story and a surprising climax.
title: Parthan Kanda Paralokam
plot: Parthasarathy is loved by all his villagers as he works for the welfare of the people. He falls in love with his rival's daughter, unaware that she has ulterior motives.

Parthan is loved by all his villagers as he works for the welfare of the people. He is constantly in disagreement with his uncle, but falls in love with his daughter, unaware that she has a hidden agenda. A new friend, Madhavan, comes to the aid of Parthan. Their adventures together form the rest of the story and a surprising climax.::Abijit Radhakrishna
